1-1 (Weights):
The quotes state that "This repository contains the weights of Grok 2, a model trained and used at xAI in 2024."  The weights are hosted on the Hugging Face repository "xai-org/grok-2."  A concrete download command is given:  
  •  "hf download xai-org/grok-2 --local-dir /local/grok-2"  
and users are told that "You can replace `/local/grok-2` with any other folder name you prefer."  After a successful download, "the folder should contain **42 files** and be approximately 500 GB."  Thus, the repository is publicly downloadable via the HF CLI, the expected payload is 42 files, and the on-disk footprint is about 500 GB.
